H0.text: Name the popular music identification app founded in 1999 whose paid-for version is sub-titled Encore. Midomi

H1.text: Name the popular music identification app founded in 1999 whose paid-for version is sub-titled Encore. SoundHound

H2.text: Name the popular music identification app founded in 1999 whose paid-for version is sub-titled Encore. Musixmatch

H3.text: Name the popular music identification app founded in 1999 whose paid-for version is sub-titled Encore. Shazam

A4.text: Shazam (music app), a music recognition app on Android and iPhone
